Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.projectElements.instance.impl

Class StudyHandler

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.projectElements.instance.impl.StudyHandler
public class StudyHandler extends Object
Handler for Project instances.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

    • addParticipant

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> addParticipant(String projectInstanceID, Participant participant)
      Add the participant to the project with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      projectInstanceID - The id of the project to which to add the participant.
      participant - The id of the participant to add to the project.
      Returns:
      a Successfull future if the participant was added

    • removeParticipant

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> removeParticipant(String projectInstanceID, Participant participant, boolean ensureDeletionFromStudy)
      Remove the participant with the given id from the project.
      Parameters:
      projectInstanceID - The id of the project to which to add the participant.
      participant - The participant to remove from the project.
      ensureDeletionFromStudy - Whether this Future should fail, if the participant was just not present in the study.
      Returns:
      a Successfull future if the participant was removed

    • createStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Study> createStudy(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject projectInformation)
      Start a project with the given Project Information. The information must contain: 1. A JsonObject under the "sourceProject" field with the fields "UUID" of the project from which this was started and a "version" of the project from which this was started 2. "private" field wrt access for this 3. "name" a name field. 4. "shortcut" (optional), that can be used as a shortcut to the project.
      Parameters:
      projectInformation - The information needed to start this project.
      Returns:
      A Future of the Study that was created

    • loadUpToDateStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Study> loadUpToDateStudy(String projectInstanceID)
      Load a project with the given ID. This can fail if the project does not exist.
      Parameters:
      projectInstanceID - the instance ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a Future to the updated Study

    • loadPotentiallyOutdatedStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Study> loadPotentiallyOutdatedStudy(String projectInstanceID)
      Load a project with the given ID and don't care whether it is current (only the ID is important here.. This can fail if the project does not exist.
      Parameters:
      projectInstanceID - the instance ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Future of the requested Study

    • updateStudy

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> updateStudy(String studyID, io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject newData)
      Update a study This can fail if the study does not exist OR if the requested update is not possible.
      Parameters:
      studyID - the instance ID of the project to retrieve.
      newData - the new data to update the study with
      Returns:
      a Future indicating whether the update was successful.

    • getStudyList

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getStudyList(io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray Permissions, boolean permissionsOnly)
      Get a list of project instances. based on the given Permissions This will return non-private projects and all projects listed in the permissions.
      Parameters:
      Permissions - the permissions for the projects
      permissionsOnly - whether to only list those projects indicated by the permissions
      Returns:
      A Future of the JsonArray containing the projects (id and name)

    • getRunningStudyList

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getRunningStudyList(io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray Permissions, boolean permissionsOnly)
      Get a list of all active project instances. based on the given Permissions This will return non-private projects and all projects listed in the permissions.
      Parameters:
      Permissions - the permissions for the projects
      permissionsOnly - whether to only list those projects indicated by the permissions
      Returns:
      A Future of the JsonArray containing the projects (id and name)

    • getStudyList

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getStudyList()
      Get the list of Studies This will return all studies available on the server
      Returns:
      A Future of the JsonArray containing the projects (id and name)

    • getProjectIDForPath

      public io.vertx.core.Future<String> getProjectIDForPath(String pathID)
      Get the project ID for a given Path-ID (i.e. translate potential shortcuts).
      Parameters:
      pathID - the {id} path parameter
      Returns:
      A future of the actual path.
